categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Grant McCune (d. December 27, 2010) was a modelmaker for Industrial Light & Magic, and was chief modelmaker for Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. He also played an Imperial gunner in the film. For his work with Star Wars, he received, along with John Dykstra, an Academy Award for Best Visual Effects.[source?]
On December 27, 2010, McCune died at home from complications of pancreatic cancer.
